                             Man on a Ledge (2012)                          
  As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening  
     to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist      
                          ever committed is in motion...

   READNFO: The resolution went off a bit on this one during the encoding   
   process, probably down to the Auto-Crop filter used. So either grab

   tweaked the colours and so on. Be warned that there is quite a bit of    
   camera movement in parts and that can cause the AR to change.
